title: Erratum to "Cobordisms of maps with singularities of given class"

title_detail.value: Erratum to "Cobordisms of maps with singularities of given class"

summary:
We correct the proof in the unoriented case of Theorem 1.2 in the paper
"Cobordisms of maps with singularities of given class"

summary_detail.value:
We correct the proof in the unoriented case of Theorem 1.2 in the paper
"Cobordisms of maps with singularities of given class"

author: Yoshifumi Ando
fulltext:
arXiv:0911.1588v1 [math.GT] 9 Nov 2009

ERRATUM TO "COBORDISMS OF MAPS WITH
SINGULARITIES OF GIVEN CLASS"
YOSHIFUMI ANDO
Abstract. We correct the proof in the unoriented case of Theorem 1.2 in the
paper "Cobordisms of maps with singularities of given class".

Andras Szücs pointed out that the proof of Theorem 1.2 in the unoriented case
is false. This is caused by a wrong assertion that any element of N(n, P ; Ω, ΩK ) is
of order two. For example, it has been proved in [4] that there can be elements of
infinite order in the cobordism groups of immersions.

The author would like to express his sincere gratitude to Professors Andras Szücs.
References
[1] Y. Ando, Cobordisms of maps with singularities of given class, Algebr. Geom. Topol. 8(2008),
1989-2029.
[2] N. E. Steenrod, Homology with local coefficients, Ann. of Math. 44(1943), 610-627.
[3] R. Thom, Espaces fibrés en sphères et carrés de Steenrod, Ann. Sci. École. Norm. Sup. (3)
69(1952), 109-182.
[4] R. Wells, Cobordism groups of immersions, Topology 5(1966), 281-294.
